name: IOPCIDevice
desc: A DriverKit provider object that manages access to your custom PCI hardware.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes the device.

items.name: - Open
items.desc: Opens a session to the PCI device.

items.name: - Close
items.desc: Closes the session to the PCI device.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the object.

items.name: - ConfigurationRead8
items.desc: Reads an 8-bit data value synchronously from the device's configuration space.

items.name: - ConfigurationRead16
items.desc: Reads a 16-bit data value synchronously from the device's configuration space.

items.name: - ConfigurationRead32
items.desc: Reads a 32-bit data value synchronously from the device's configuration space.

items.name: - ConfigurationWrite8
items.desc: Writes an 8-bit data value to the device's configuration space.

items.name: - ConfigurationWrite16
items.desc: Writes a 16-bit data value to the device's configuration space.

items.name: - ConfigurationWrite32
items.desc: Writes a 32-bit data value to the device's configuration space.

items.name: - MemoryRead8
items.desc: Reads an 8-bit value synchronously from the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - MemoryRead16
items.desc: Reads a 16-bit value synchronously from the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - MemoryRead32
items.desc: Reads a 32-bit value synchronously from the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - MemoryRead64
items.desc: Reads a 64-bit value synchronously from the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - MemoryWrite8
items.desc: Writes an 8-bit value to the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - MemoryWrite16
items.desc: Writes a 16-bit value to the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - MemoryWrite32
items.desc: Writes a 32-bit value to the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - MemoryWrite64
items.desc: Writes a 64-bit value to the PCI device's aperture at the specified memory index.

items.name: - FindPCICapability
items.desc: Search the configuration space for a PCI capability register.

items.name: - GetBusDeviceFunction
items.desc: Returns the device's bus, device, and function numbers.

items.name: - HasPCIPowerManagement
items.desc: Determines whether the device has the specified PCI bus power management capabilities.

items.name: - EnablePCIPowerManagement
items.desc: Configures the device's PCI bus power management capabilities.
